0871A46B.Toast: Find a way to cleanse the corruption in the Dark Thicket.

1315987A.Phase23Description: The ritual scroll I seek is housed in the old druid archives beneath Túr Dúlra.  Unfortunately that area has been overrun by demons following Astaroth's attack.

5091BE7E.Phase63Description: The ritual scroll is gone but Scholar Yuein can recreate it from the druid stones inside the Lair.  I should speak to him at the tree to get a copy.

803B8057.Phase20Description: I have the scroll.  I should return to Shob'ha so she can prepare the ritual.

83A65A9D.Callback52Header: Enter the Lair of the Despoiler

B1D3AB7C.Phase43Description: I need to take the corrupted bear heart to Scholar Yuein in Túr Dúlra and explain the situation.
